title: eth_getBlockByNumber method handler crashed
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `tg version 2021.05.1-alpha`
OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour

Whenever I receive a new block event, I immediately recover the block content.

#### Actual behaviour

Sometimes the call crashes and is unable to retrieve the data.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1. Start a `newBlockHeaders` subscription with ethers.js (`provder.on('block', callback)`)
2. Whenever a new block header is received, perform an `eth_getBlockByNumber` rpc call with provided block number
